housing.text:
• V PENZIONU Kamélie can accommodate 8 people, there is a kitchen with equipment, fridge, microwave, kettle, cooker, large bathroom with shower, toilet, automatic washing machine.
  • In the large common room of PENZIONU Kamélie you can enjoy a quiet meal or have fun together, even by candlelight. Of course there is an INTERNET connection via Wi-Fi.
  • You can relax in the garden, and there is a small playground for the little ones and bigger ones. Camping is also possible in the garden.
  • If the weather is nice, you can cool your body in the pool and in the evening enjoy a pleasant barbecue on the terrace by the pond.
  • In PENZION Kamélie also offers bicycle and ski storage and free car parking in the garden.
housing.rules:
Accommodation rules of the guesthouse

Introduction:

  1. These accommodation rules (after referred to as the "Rules") govern the conditions for providing accommodation services at the guesthouse.
  2. The guesthouse provides accommodation services in accordance with applicable laws and based on the conclusion of an accommodation contract.
  3. By staying at the guesthouse, the guest agrees to comply with these Rules and follow the instructions of the guesthouse staff.

I. Reservation and Accommodation Confirmation:

  1. Accommodation reservations can be made by phone, email.
  2. To confirm the reservation, a deposit or advance payment for the accommodation will be required.

II. Check-in and Check-out:

  1. Check-in: Accommodation is available from 2:00 PM to 6:00 PM. If a later arrival is necessary, it should be communicated to the guesthouse in advance.
  2. Check-out: Rooms must be vacated by 10:00 AM on the departure day.
  3. Guests are required to present a valid identification document upon arrival.

III. Payments:

  1. The accommodation price is determined according to the current guesthouse price list.
  2. Guests are obligated to settle the total amount for accommodation upon arrival or as agreed upon during the reservation.
  3. Accepted payment methods include cash or bank transfer.

IV. Order and Quietness:

  1. Guests must observe order and quietness in the common areas of the guesthouse and inside the accommodation rooms from 10:00 PM to 7:00 AM.
  2. Smoking is prohibited in enclosed areas of the guesthouse.
  3. Consumption of food only in the common area.

V. Liability for Damages:

  1. Guests are responsible for any damage caused to the guesthouse property, whether caused intentionally or due to negligence.
  2. The guesthouse reserves the right to claim compensation for damages caused by guests.

VI. Lost and Found:

  1. The guesthouse is not liable for lost or forgotten guest belongings.
  2. Found items can be handed over to the guesthouse staff.

VII. Limitation of Liability:

  1. The guesthouse is not liable for any failures or malfunctions of technical equipment, water supply, or electrical circuits if they are caused by independent circumstances.

VIII. Termination of Accommodation:

  1. The guesthouse reserves the right to terminate the accommodation of a guest who repeatedly violates these Rules or behaves disruptively or aggressively towards other guests or staff.
  2. In such a case, the guest is not entitled to a refund for unused accommodation.

This accommodation rules are valid from the date of publication and are binding for all guesthouse guests. The guesthouse reserves the right to make changes to these Rules without prior notice.

trips.title: Have you already planned your holiday this year?
trips.text1: Come on over. Česká Kamenice is a town on the border of three protected areas - the Elbe Sandstone Mountains, the Lusatian Mountains and the Bohemian Central Highlands. The very names of these localities tell us that you have somewhere to go. The Czech Switzerland, the newest national park, also invites to trips. You can do both hiking and cycling.
trips.text2: No less interesting are the cultural monuments of our town, for example: the Marian Chapel, the Church of St. James the Greater with a lookout tower.  On hot days you can use the beautiful swimming pool in Ceska Kamenice.
trips.text3: All details about the tours can be obtained at the information centre in the square.
